nodes.text: Stonerays were a species of flying reptavian carnivores native to Yavin 4. Living in swamps and jungles, they used their taloned tails to disembowel their prey.
Stonerays first appear in the Star Wars: The Old Republic: Shadow of Revan expansion, released on December 2, 2014. The game uses for stonerays the same model as for the Bogstalkers.
